body: Hello, I recently joined this community and I am having a lovely time! The server overall has a great community, which I look for in most servers, but they don't have great communities, let alone a community at all. So, I just wanted to say hi and formally introduce myself! Bye Bye for now.
body_tagged: Hello, I recently joined this community and I am having a lovely time! The server overall has a great community, which I look for in most servers, but they don't have great communities, let alone a community at all. So, I just wanted to say hi and formally introduce myself! Bye Bye for now.
title: Hello, My name is 14carfan!

replies.body: Hey there! Welcome to the Avicus Community, you'll love it here! ^-^ If you have any questions or concerns, feel free to contact any Staff Member, as we will help you! As for that, hope you'll enjoy it here! ^-^

replies.body: Thanks so much guys! I'm defiantly here to stay! Even more now knowing that Avicus has so much support!
